Pre-Game Insights: Guinea Bissau are in second place with five points, while Egypt are runaway leaders of the group with nine points.
The hosts have not won any of their last five games in all competitions, while Egypt have had a mixed result in that period, winning two, losing two and drawing once.
The away side currently holds a four-point lead over Guinea Bissau in Group A.
Mama Balde is expected to lead the frontline of the host nation, while Mahmoud Trezeguet is the man in form for the Pharaohs.
Egypt's Mahmoud Trezeguet has netted four goals in the World Cup qualifiers so far.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The match is scheduled to kick off on Monday, 10 June 2024 at 9:30 PM IST at the Est√°dio 24 de Setembro.
The predicted lineup for Guinea Bissau is (4-3-3): Balde (GK); Cande, Encada, Sangante, Djalo; Cassama, Bikel, Semedo; Dju, Mama Balde, E Balde.
The predicted lineup for Egypt is (3-5-2): El Shenawy (GK); Rabia, Fathi, Abdelmonem; Hany, Attia, Zizo, Ashour, Trezeguet; Mohamed, Salah.
The telecast for the match will be available on FanCode in India, ESPN in the UK, FOX Sports App in the US, and FIFA+ in Nigeria.
Others: The match is part of the 2026 FIFA World Cup African qualifiers, and Guinea Bissau are looking to reduce the gap with the leaders.
Guinea Bissau's Houboulang Mendes is back and available post-suspension.
